overview: Bellator 199: Bader vs. King Mo is scheduled to take place on May 12, 2018 at the SAP Center in San Jose, California. The event will air live in prime time on Paramount Network.  This card featured the fourth and final bout in the opening round of the 2018 Bellator Heavyweight World Grand Prix Tournament as Light Heavyweight Champion Ryan Bader moved up to face Muhammed Lawal.
title: Bellator 199: Bader vs. King Mo
